feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX7][Network] - Network device operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 12, 04:00 - 07:00 UTC

Sep 22, 21:27 UTC
Scheduled - Start time: 12/10/2022 04:00 UTC
End time: 12/10/2022 07:00 UTC
Service impact: A few seconds of Input/Output freeze when the service will do a switchover (2 times)
Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will do a maintenance operation on our network equipment related to Hosted Private Cloud products to maintain consistency.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] Switch Upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 5, 04:00 - 07:00 UTC

Sep 15, 21:31 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 05/10/2022 04:00 UTC
End time : 05/10/2022 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Our teams will carry out an update operation on storage equipment. This update will be performed first on the nodes in standby. Once the update is complete, a switchover will be performed to update the remaining devices. Expect a few seconds freeze of the inputs/outputs during the switchover.
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure and to have a homogeneous park, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment

entry.title: [Global][Dedicated Cloud] - End of Life Dedicated Cloud
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 30, 12:00 UTC  -  Dec 20, 20:29 UTC

Jul 25, 13:27 UTC
Scheduled - End of Life Dedicated Cloud: 30 September 2022
We informed you in October 2021 that our Dedicad Cloud service will reach its end of life and will be discontinued the 30st September 2022. This step is important for your VMware platforms to improve the quality of service, performance, and security of your clusters. Indeed, "Dedicated Cloud" hardware used, pre-2016, does not allow us to provide the best level of service and integration with new modern architectures of VMware.
Following our previous email, many customers started to plan and/or to migrate and we encourage you to do the same to avoid the September deadline.

Guide to migrating to a new infrastructure:
https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/private-cloud/vdc-migration/

entry.title: [RBX1A-SBG2A][Network] - SecNumCloud - hosts upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 26, 06:00 UTC  -  Sep 30, 16:00 UTC

Sep 21, 17:39 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 26/09/2022 06:00 UTC
End time : 30/09/2022 16:00 UTC
Service impact : hosts rebooted
Service improvement : All hosts have to be upgraded frequently due to the VMware's matrix of compatibility.
Builds will be pushed to the host, put in maintenance mode, all Virtual machines will be moved with Vmotion and last hosts will be rebooted .
If we meet an issue during the reboot of the host , it will be replaced. (20 min)

entry.title: [SBG2A-RBX1A][HostedPrivateCloud] - SecNumCloud - vCenter upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 26, 06:00 UTC  -  Sep 30, 16:00 UTC

Sep 21, 17:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 26/09/2022 06:00 UTC
End time : 30/09/2022 16:00 UTC
Service impact : vCenter will be unavailable during the operation
Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling a upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution.
